httpdocs
Table of Contents

PostBillingPortalConfigurationsConfiguration

Updates a configuration that describes the functionality of the customer portal.

HTTP Request

POST \v1\billing_portal\configurations\{configuration} HTTP/1.1

host: api.stripe.com:443
eTag: "23423432"
accept: application/json
content-type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded


{ "example": "Example goes here" }

Parameters

configuration [ in: path type: string ]
required

Request Body Schema

{
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "active": {
      "type": "boolean",
      "description": "Whether the configuration is active and can be used to create portal sessions."
    },
    "business_profile": {
      "title": "business_profile_update_param",
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "headline": {
          "maxLength": 60,
          "type": "string"
        },
        "privacy_policy_url": {
          "anyOf": [
            {
              "type": "string"
            },
            {
              "enum": [
                ""
              ],
              "type": "string"
            }
          ]
        },
        "terms_of_service_url": {
          "anyOf": [
            {
              "type": "string"
            },
            {
              "enum": [
                ""
              ],
              "type": "string"
            }
          ]
        }
      },
      "description": "The business information shown to customers in the portal."
    },
    "default_return_url": {
      "anyOf": [
        {
          "type": "string"
        },
        {
          "enum": [
            ""
          ],
          "type": "string"
        }
      ],
      "description": "The default URL to redirect customers to when they click on the portal's link to return to your website. This can be overriden when creating the session."
    },
    "expand": {
      "type": "array",
      "items": {
        "maxLength": 5000,
        "type": "string"
      },
      "description": "Specifies which fields in the response should be expanded."
    },
    "features": {
      "title": "features_updating_param",
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "customer_update": {
          "title": "customer_update_updating_param",
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "allowed_updates": {
              "anyOf": [
                {
                  "type": "array",
                  "items": {
                    "enum": [
                      "address",
                      "email",
                      "name",
                      "phone",
                      "shipping",
                      "tax_id"
                    ],
                    "type": "string"
                  }
                },
                {
                  "enum": [
                    ""
                  ],
                  "type": "string"
                }
              ]
            },
            "enabled": {
              "type": "boolean"
            }
          }
        },
        "invoice_history": {
          "title": "invoice_list_param",
          "required": [
            "enabled"
          ],
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "enabled": {
              "type": "boolean"
            }
          }
        },
        "payment_method_update": {
          "title": "payment_method_update_param",
          "required": [
            "enabled"
          ],
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "enabled": {
              "type": "boolean"
            }
          }
        },
        "subscription_cancel": {
          "title": "subscription_cancel_updating_param",
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "cancellation_reason": {
              "title": "subscription_cancellation_reason_updating_param",
              "required": [
                "enabled"
              ],
              "type": "object",
              "properties": {
                "enabled": {
                  "type": "boolean"
                },
                "options": {
                  "anyOf": [
                    {
                      "type": "array",
                      "items": {
                        "enum": [
                          "customer_service",
                          "low_quality",
                          "missing_features",
                          "other",
                          "switched_service",
                          "too_complex",
                          "too_expensive",
                          "unused"
                        ],
                        "type": "string"
                      }
                    },
                    {
                      "enum": [
                        ""
                      ],
                      "type": "string"
                    }
                  ]
                }
              }
            },
            "enabled": {
              "type": "boolean"
            },
            "mode": {
              "enum": [
                "at_period_end",
                "immediately"
              ],
              "type": "string"
            },
            "proration_behavior": {
              "enum": [
                "always_invoice",
                "create_prorations",
                "none"
              ],
              "type": "string"
            }
          }
        },
        "subscription_pause": {
          "title": "subscription_pause_param",
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "enabled": {
              "type": "boolean"
            }
          }
        },
        "subscription_update": {
          "title": "subscription_update_updating_param",
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "default_allowed_updates": {
              "anyOf": [
                {
                  "type": "array",
                  "items": {
                    "enum": [
                      "price",
                      "promotion_code",
                      "quantity"
                    ],
                    "type": "string"
                  }
                },
                {
                  "enum": [
                    ""
                  ],
                  "type": "string"
                }
              ]
            },
            "enabled": {
              "type": "boolean"
            },
            "products": {
              "anyOf": [
                {
                  "type": "array",
                  "items": {
                    "title": "subscription_update_product_param",
                    "required": [
                      "prices",
                      "product"
                    ],
                    "type": "object",
                    "properties": {
                      "prices": {
                        "type": "array",
                        "items": {
                          "maxLength": 5000,
                          "type": "string"
                        }
                      },
                      "product": {
                        "maxLength": 5000,
                        "type": "string"
                      }
                    }
                  }
                },
                {
                  "enum": [
                    ""
                  ],
                  "type": "string"
                }
              ]
            },
            "proration_behavior": {
              "enum": [
                "always_invoice",
                "create_prorations",
                "none"
              ],
              "type": "string"
            }
          }
        }
      },
      "description": "Information about the features available in the portal."
    },
    "login_page": {
      "title": "login_page_update_param",
      "required": [
        "enabled"
      ],
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "enabled": {
          "type": "boolean"
        }
      },
      "description": "The hosted login page for this configuration. Learn more about the portal login page in our integration docs."
    },
    "metadata": {
      "anyOf": [
        {
          "type": "object",
          "additionalProperties": {
            "type": "string"
          }
        },
        {
          "enum": [
            ""
          ],
          "type": "string"
        }
      ],
      "description": "Set of key-value pairs that you can attach to an object. This can be useful for storing additional information about the object in a structured format. Individual keys can be unset by posting an empty value to them. All keys can be unset by posting an empty value to metadata."
    }
  },
  "additionalProperties": false
}

Responses

  • 200 Successful response.
  • default Error response.
